subject: You've just sent a job to {{receiver.contact_name}}

rows.text: Your job has now been sent to {{receiver.contact_name}}. We will let you know if they apply for finance and what the outcome of their application is. We'll also send them a follow up email if they don't view the job or apply over the next few days.
Remember, if this job is no longer needed you can simply archieve it on your dashboard.
